explains: adj. 不适当的，过分的；未到期的
wordGroup: undue influence n. 不正当影响；[律]不正当压力
undue delay 不当延误；不应有的延误

sentences.en: They are taking undue advantage of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他们过分利用了这种情势。

sentences.en: The work should be carried out without undue delay.
sentences.cn: 进行这项工作不得有不当的延误。

sentences.en: While the quality of legal journalism varies greatly, there is an undue reliance amongst many journalists on interpretations supplied to them by lawyers.
sentences.cn: 虽然法律新闻报道的质量良莠不齐，但在很多新闻记者中，存在过度依赖律师给他们提供诠释的现象。
